data.name: Cute Honey: Bunny Girl - adult patch
data.detailed_description:
Cute Honey: Bunny Girl is a casual tower defense game in which players can place various props to reduce the physical strength of Elise the Phantom, and when Elise's physical strength reaches 0, players will successfully prevent the Phantom from entering human society!
In the game, you will experience the cute Elise in human form, and conquer the sexy Elise in chimera form!
Various scenes.
Different props.
Interesting and creative tower defense gameplay.
In DLC, players will unlock the interaction between dynamic CG and part of CG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
